place.name: FOULDEN
place.gazetteerText: Foulden, par. and vil., Berwickshire, 5 miles NW. of Berwick-upon-Tweed, 3278 ac., pop. 393; P.O.; in the church of Foulden, March 1587, the commissioners of Elizabeth met those of James VI. to vindicate the execution of Mary Queen of Scots; in E. vicinity of vil. is Foulden House. (In 1887, John Bartholomew's Gazetteer of the British Isles)
